Name: The Istrys
About the game: Cubistry™ and its sibling 3D match 2 puzzle games dubbed the Istrys by fans are now in one place as 'The Istrys™'! Start playing for free all your favorites and arrange them however you like to suit how you like to play. Create a Cubitopia™(coming soon) account to keep your scores across multiple platforms. Subscribe to Cubitopia™ to unlock new Istrys earlier, access exclusive content, level up using points from multiple games(More Cubitopia™ games are coming soon), remove ads, and more! -Fun 3D match 2 puzzle game play with 17 singleplayer modes with more to come. -Co-op and versus modes. -All your favorite Istrys in one place. (Not all Istrys are available yet but are coming soon.) -Cross platform achievements and leaderboards with Cubitopia™(Coming soon). -Premium features with a subscription to Cubitopia™(Coming soon).
